title: Fake "Sandstorm ekko" skin website
body:
I've seen this time and time again on lol, these god danm "Phishing" sites that try too take your account, or make you do surveys.

Anyway, i'm just putting this down too warn people about this link _removed_ , Its fake, if you wanna check it out, just don't press on login or else it try's too make you give them your lol password & username, so just a warning

Signed, Random dude

P.S. If rito finds this, Is it possible for you people too take these sites down? Just asking.

replies.body:
Hey there, thanks for the heads up. I've reported the link to the relevant team at Riot. I'm removing it from your post to remove risk to players.

Take note everyone, don't click on random crap on boards and news post comments claiming to give away free stuff. You're just giving away your account.
